entry.title: A History of the Trump Hush-Money Saga
entry.content: The path leading to Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Braggâ€™s decision on whether to charge Donald Trump for his role in paying hush money to a porn star began nearly seven years ago.

entry.title: Gershkovich Loved Russia, Country That Turned on Him
entry.content: The Wall Street Journal correspondent, whose parents fled the Soviet Union, made Moscow a second home. He was detained Wednesday by the FSB for alleged espionage, an allegation the Journal vehemently denies.
